num_respawn.description: Row number of user's respaun in the battle. (if 0 - mode without respaun)

skill_used.description: Equiment on vehicle and it's spending

economy_result.description: User's income and expenses in battle

death_reason_name.description: User's vehicle death reason (if -1 user alive)

death_reason_id.description: Death_Reason id by user vehicle (if -1 user alive)

killer_id.description: Spa_id of the killer vehicle. Self-kill is also possible

time_life.description: User life time (until kill) in arena (in seconds)
